text: Kwame Raoul (born September 30, 1964) is an American lawyer and politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Raoul is the 42nd Attorney General of Illinois since 2019. Raoul was a member of the Illinois Senate. He represented the 13th district from 2004 to 2019 after he was appointed to fill the seat left by Barack Obama, upon Obama's election to the U.S. Senate. Raoul was the Democratic Party's nominee for Attorney General of Illinois in the 2018 election and won the general election. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography, bills and committees at the 98th Illinois General Assembly **By session: 98th, 97th, 96th, 95th, 94th, 93rd *Kwame Raoul for State Senator * * Senator Kwame Raoul at Illinois Senate Democrats Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:DePaul University alumni Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Illinois attorneys general
title: Kwame Raoul
